main event: An observer in Tripoli, Iowa reported seeing a bright object resembling a football, accompanied by the sound of an idling plane.
interesting points: The object appeared to change colors between yellow and white,The observation was made under clear night conditions with many stars visible,The observer used binoculars to view the object,The sighting lasted for approximately twenty minutes,The object was thought to have no distinguishing features or exhaust.
sighted object: a bright object resembling a football
witness description: J.N. Hayden, 63, Justice of the Peace with knowledge of meteorology and astronomy
